title: CryptoHFs
author: CryptoHFs
created_time: April 12, 2023, 02:36:56 AMLast edit: April 12, 2023, 02:51:28 AM by CryptoHFs
content: I need to run one month test on https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5237323.0 for power of 510 TH/sif you are willing to do this like nicehash do but directly between us post your priceI will send all the cost on the first day before you run your miners

comments.author: nalien2000
comments.body: I have 110th, so i could do a partial amount of what you want.  i would do 31 days for .01 btc if you want.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: If I keep it pointed at viabtc I will earn0.0409479 btc for 31 days.So I would consider selling it to you for +10%0.04504269 btc

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: i will take both of your dealsplease post your bitcoin payment address and I will pay you as soon as nicehash process my pending withdrawal

comments.author: nalien2000
comments.body: Cool, would you mind direct messaging me your adddress for me to mine to?  And i will reply with my bitcoin address please?    And i will point my miner to your address right away.
